data.title: Can a bad GPA be improved before graduation in college?
data.meta_description:
Answer: If you understand how averages work, this should be straightforward to understand how to increase your GPA. If you get 2.0 your first two years, you need a 4.0 your last two years to end up with 3.0.

But there's two problems:

You're probably using your GPA to get a job or grad school in...
